R

Race - Class in buyanova.entity
Sport event typically involving two or more horses ridden by jockeys over a set distance, competing for prizeMoney.

Interface used to mark classes that implement data access for Race entity.

RepositoryException - Exception in buyanova.exception

RepositoryFactory - Enum in buyanova.factory
RepositoryFactory class uses factory pattern to decide what Repository implementations it should provide to layers above the data access layer.
